commands_raw:
signal(setspeakername,Maria Garter)
[i]I didn't think someone as big as ComptaCorp would ask for my help...
This might be a bit harder than dealing with small businesses.[/i]
?> ->Intro 1
name: start

commands_raw:
signal(setspeakername,Maria Garter)
[i]Is this girl the financial manager's trainee or something?
She looks lost.[/i]
?> ->Intro 2
name: Intro 1

commands_raw:
signal(setspeakername,Maria Garter)
Good morning! I'm Miss Garter: Potential Energy management plan consultant.
I was supposed to meet with a ComptaCorp representative, to discuss a resource management strategy.
?> ->Intro 3
name: Intro 2

commands_raw:
signal(setspeakername,Client)
H-hello! Yes, that would be me.
?> ->Assessment 1
name: Intro 3

commands_raw:
signal(setspeakername,Maria Garter)
I'm sure you have no time to waste, so let's get to business, shall we?
What are the companies current issues?
?> ->Assessment 3
name: Assessment 2

commands_raw:
signal(setspeakername,Client)
Well, the company's latest financial report is... worse than usual.
My supervisors tasked me with finding a better resource management strategy.
?> ->Assessment 4
name: Assessment 3

commands_raw:
signal(setspeakername,Maria Garter)
I see:
?> Do you know where to start?->Assessment 5
?> Any idea what might have caused this?->Assessment 5
name: Assessment 4
